game_description: Gravity Lab is a physics and electronics puzzle game that will keep you busy figuring out solutions and exploring an abandoned moon base. Now includes the "Microstar", "Time Travel" and "Passthrough" content updates. "I have lost hours to Gravity Lab. The VR immersion is almost secondary to the mental immersion in eking out the best solutions to the problems" - Road To VR Features: - 55 mind bending puzzles, with 3 variations each - Integrated level editor and workshop for community created levels - Multiple locomotion and comfort options including teleport, joystick locomotion and miniature mode for seated play - Cloud Sync and Leaderboards - Passthrough Mode Please be aware that strong gravitational forces can cause a looming feeling of being observed! Never look directly at the emitted particles! All damages to the time and space continuum and all involved repair costs will be passed on to you! -- Gravity Lab Management
review_1: This is a fun puzzle game, but I wish I could save progress better. Also it freezes too often. The screen will turn into small square with black surrounding making it unplayable. I can go through a level or two, then "black walls" appear. I can't even exit the game and have to power off or restart the oculus.
review_2: There are very few problems with the game other than there being TOO much to do. It's also made by one dev (I think) sooo you guys complain too much.
review_3: This game was so fun! It felt like I was riding a real roller coaster! The only problem was that there were a few glitches. Sometimes, when I’m in race mode, the track will disappear and I can’t tell where I’m going, leading me to crash. The wierd thing is that even after I crash, the track doesn’t reappear. It’s still gone. I end up having to restart my headset and go into the game again. It’s still a really fun game and this is the only glitch, so it still deserves the five stars I rated it.
review_4: Just purchased this and although it its fun to play it gave me some portal vives i do have one complaint graphics are not good at all and whats even worse is that it says its quest pro optimized but really its so blurry and text barely readable
review_5: Great game. Puzzling in this game is so cool is so cool. But i lost all my progress! Help
